results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በእርሱ (በቁርኣን ንባብ) ልትቸኩል ምላስህን በእርሱ አታላውስ፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: (በልብህ ውስጥ) መሰብሰቡና ማንበቡ በእኛ ላይ ነውና፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
